website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for CFA test candidates who seek a more structured study approach. We recommend the Kindle version for "skimmers".
pros: Suggests real life, real time study strategies
Extremely thorough study sections combined with a calendar-based schedule
cons: Much of the information available through free sources

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had read this book sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this last year when I first started studying for the CFA. The $8 I just spent on the Kindle version would have saved me at least $1000 this year alone. I wasted that much money on brand new Schweser books (printed of course) and their horrendous online course videos. Everyone has it drilled into them that Schweser is the standard, but as I look at the Analyst Notes website that she's talking about, I realize how stupid I was. These notes are better than Schweser, which is almost as much material as the CFA books themselves, just dumbed down. Oh well, lesson learned for when I hopefully start studying for L2.
customer_reviews.author: OwlK

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I stumbled across this book
customer_reviews.text: I am just about to begin studying for my Level 1 exam , and just finished reading Rachel's book. Her advice is concise , relevant , blunt and necessary for anyone about to embark on this CFA journey , despite the level. I shudder when I think that I was about to start this path without having known what I learnt in this book . Reading Rachel's book is like having a mentor share their wise insights with you . You will not regret reading this book. Thank you Rachel !
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!! No one should start CFA preparation ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! No one should start CFA preparation without reading this one. It was an enjoyable experience to finish the book in one night. spending one day on this book will save weeks of searching. This is a comprehensive guide with practical advice. I am highly recommending this book.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great introduction to the CFA
customer_reviews.text: I looked through several books and reviews for those books before purchasing "Direct Path to the CFA Charter...". I chose this book because it offered scheduling for levels 1-3, and tidbits of advice from a charter holder. This book did not let me down. An easy read full of relevant content from start to finish. I highly recommend this book!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kulavic

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I've read this book twice. Once, when I was looking into the CFA test and now that I'm ready to embark on the journey. Rachel gives actionable insights but also pumps you up for what will be a daunting task. She repeatedly emphasized how this is not necessarily a game of wits or IQ but one of endurance and resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: While there are some good takeaways, it is not worth the price of the book and I would not highly recommend the print version. You can possibly get the Kindle format and skim through quickly.

customer_reviews.title: Clear, concise...
customer_reviews.text: Clear, concise and mixed with the prefect mixture of truth, realism and encouragement. If you're considering sitting for this designation, you'll do well to take the time to read this book. Rachel not only gives you an insight of the exams layout, but gives you a game plan for tackling the CFA exam. Rachel also makes herself accessible if you have questions beyond the book. Again anyone looking to add the CFA to their credentials should definitely add "Direct Path" to their library. A must read!
customer_reviews.author: Claude Baker Jr

customer_reviews.title: An amazing synopsis of the coveted journey!!
customer_reviews.text: A must read for anybody considering the CFA Charter. Provides some very useful and insightful information in one place. Worth every cent spent and I feel more prepared to slay the beast and earn my charter.

customer_reviews.title: Solid mentorship

customer_reviews.title: Great read for anyone considering sitting for the CFA exam
customer_reviews.text: Great read for anyone considering sitting for the CFA exam. The book let's you know what it takes to succeed; hours of study, strategy, and mind set. If you think you can pass the CFA with a few hours of study on the weekends, statistics will prove you wrong..
customer_reviews.author: Family Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful - a coach in the form of text
customer_reviews.text: I value and appreciate the flexibility to manage my own schedule while preparing for the CFA exam. But what makes the Program so enticing also presents challenges. You're on your own with no professor or classmates to help guide you. The Direct Path to the CFA Charter serves as a coach and guide in the form of text that has helped me immensely in preparing. Without such a useful guide, I wouldn't be able to use my study time as efficiently as possible. The material is hard enough. Might as well use the wise and honest advice from someone who understands the same challenges candidates are going through.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wilson

customer_reviews.text: Very good roadmap to the CFA Charter. Insightful and encouraging for anyone seriously thinking about starting this life-altering journey that is the CFA.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good book. Follow this you will surely make it

Most CFA chartered holders said that flash cards is the single most key to success of passing the exams. This book helps a lot in that area.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful and thoughtfully organized
customer_reviews.text: I am just starting the process of studying for Level I and this book was very helpful in setting expectations and determining an action plan to tackle the studying. I found that the book did a great job of summarizing and concisely displaying the numerous resources available to candidates, which was helpful as someone who is going through the process for the first time. The key takeaways at the end of each chapter will be very helpful throughout the study process as an easy way to reference specific tips without having to re-read the entire book. Additionally, the sample study schedules provide great insight into the pace at which specific topics should be covered.
